CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1945, pg. 3, reads: "Invaluable Citations - Women who received citations for selling War Bonds to build and completely equip the LST 750, which was sunk in Leyte Gulf in the Philippines, said the citations became one of their most cherished possessions, when questioned here. Seated, left to right: Mrs. Viola Sams, Miss Coetha Mitchell and Miss Rose Butler.  Standing left to right: Mrs. Bettye Young, Mrs. Maggie Isenhour, Mrs. Emma West and Mrs. Mary N. Smith. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, seated from left: Viola Sams, Coetha Mitchell, Miss Rose Butler; standing: Bettye Young, Maggie Isenhour, Emma West, and Mary N. Smith, posed in Harris Studio
